short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View the meta details of any web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meta Details Viewer is a powerful yet simple Chrome extension suitable for web developers, SEO specialists, and content creators who need quick access to the essential details of any web page. With Meta Details Viewer, you can effortlessly extract various meta details, including title, description, keywords, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card data, and more, directly from the browser.

Key Features:
Comprehensive Meta Data Extraction: Instantly view all key meta details, such as the page title, description, keywords, Open Graph tags, Twitter Cards, canonical URLs, and more.

Detailed Content Overview: Get a clear view of headings (H1, H2, H3), images (src and alt attributes), links, structured data (Schema.org), and other crucial page elements.

Copy All Meta Details: With a single click, copy all extracted meta details, including the page URL, to your clipboard for easy use in reports, analysis, or content creation.

Selective Copying: Select individual meta details using checkboxes and copy only the information you need, making it perfect for focused tasks.

Modern, Intuitive Design: Enjoy a clean, pastel-colored interface with rounded corners, making your experience both pleasant and efficient.

One-Click Copy for Individual Items: Each meta detail is accompanied by a "Copy" button, allowing you to quickly copy specific pieces of information as needed.
